ooC: Airly, I think you misunderstand, Firestrike bent the metal 
around your char and welded it shut. Meaning, he's surrounded by a 
metal prison of sorts, he can't seem Switchblade or Firestrike (it 
doesn't have bars of anything), but he can by all means talk to 
them. You'll prolly want to repost.

-- Switchblade / Astrotrain --

Switchblade smiles, "Perceptor, I would have thought you smarter 
than to try such a foolish act." He toys with the "Megatron" in his 
hand, and aims at the metal prison, fully prepared to destroy the 
bot, and parts of the base in the process. "Is there a GOOD reason 
for your idocy? A reason that would prevent me from shooting?"

Astrotrain enters the room, "Whoa, what happened?"

Switchblade smiles, "Perceptor is about to lose control of something 
very important to him."

Astrotrain walks over to Switchblade, and glances at the metal cage. 
Then over at the control panel, and shakes his head. "Are you sure 
you want Perceptor to die?"

Switchblade turns his head to face the much larger Astrotrain with a 
warning glance, and speaks in a cautious tone, "Astrotrain, such 
indecision will get you killed someday. If Perceptor dies, I could 
care less. However, I think that Firestrike would take more pleasure 
of out of it." He spins "Megatron" and hands it handle first to his 
lackey. "Enjoy the destruction, Firestrike." The small bot turns and 
saunters over to his slightly singed chair, sits down, and kicks his 
feet up.
